name: GorE (Kyunru, mireyu)
description:
In GorE you have to choose your path. Good or Evil.

For this you have to collect Good or Evil energy. Some platform and features can only be used if you have enough energy of the right type, e.g. to use double jump you need enough Good energy.

Controls:

Move:                                   Left/right arrow key
Jump:                                    Space/ up key                             

Team:
Programming/Art:                                     Kyunru (Stephanie Kühnl)
Level Design/Sound:                                Mireyu (Martin Jank)

Please download the game, if the online version does not work :)
